vwr.project.voidbubble.ui
Class MenuItemDecoration

java.lang.Object
  vwr.project.voidbubble.ui.MenuItem
      vwr.project.voidbubble.ui.MenuItemDecoration

public class MenuItemDecoration
extends MenuItem

Non interactive menu items. Does not support having draw elements. No sound. Only textures and text.
